text: Bear McCreary (born February 17, 1979) is an American musician and composer of movie, television, and video game music scores based in Los Angeles, California. He was born in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. His work includes the music scores of the television series Battlestar Galactica (2004), Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D., Outlander, The Walking Dead, The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power, The Serpent Queen, the video games Call of Duty: Vanguard, God of War and God of War Ragnar√∂k, and the movies Godzilla: King of the Monsters. ==Other websites== * Official website * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American composers Category:Emmy Award winners Category:Musicians from Fort Lauderdale, Florida
title: Bear McCreary
